        FinLab Nigeria Limited - Since 1981, we have set a standard in Scientific and Labouratory Equipment, Furniture & fittings. The quality of our products and services has continued to improve over the years.

Note: For more enquires, contact us: 09139385101.

Logistics Officer Job at Runola Nigeria Limited




        
    

        
        Runola Nigeria Limited is a parent company with four subsidiaries (AdelooSuites, Runoplast, Runoclean, and RunoFeed)committed to delivering high-quality products and services to our customers. With a strong focus on innovation, efficiency, and excellence, we have established ourselves as a trusted name in the industry.

Our company operates across multiple locations, ensuring seamless production and service delivery while upholding the highest standards of professionalism. We value teamwork, integrity, and continuous growth, providing our employees with opportunities to excel in their careers.
     

            
    



We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Logistics Officer
Job Location: Asaba, Delta
Employment Type: Full-time
Company: Feed Manufacturing Company

Description


	We are currently hiring a Logistics Officer to manage and coordinate our company vehicles and act as the liaison between our delivery drivers and management.


Key Responsibilities


	Schedule and track deliveries and vehicle assignments.
	Supervise company drivers and ensure timely delivery of goods.
	Monitor vehicle maintenance and ensure all documents are up-to-date.
	Act as the link between drivers and the operations team.
	Prepare delivery and fleet reports.


Requirements


	OND / HND / BSc in Logistics, Business Admin or a related field.
	3 - 5 years of experience in logistics/fleet coordination.
	Strong communication and organizational skills.
	Knowledge of Asaba and Delta State routes is an advantage.
	Ability to multitask and manage a team of drivers.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: careers@runola.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note


	For more inquiries. Call: 07016549893.
	Only qualified candidates will be contacted.

  "description": "The Creatives Island (TCI) is a fast-growing travel and experiences company curating unforgettable group and solo adventures across Africa.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Posititon: Sales and Marketing Lead

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos&nbsp;
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	We&rsquo;re seeking a results-driven Marketing and Sales Manager to lead our brand growth, digital campaigns, and community engagement initiatives.


What You&rsquo;ll Do


	Develop and execute marketing strategies to drive trip bookings and brand awareness.
	Identify and close business leads.
	Develop and execute strategies to drive business in new and existing markets
	Manage content creation and scheduling across Instagram, TikTok, YouTube, and newsletters.
	Run and optimize paid ad campaigns (Meta, Google, TikTok).
	Build partnerships with influencers, travel bloggers, and lifestyle brands.
	Track and report on key metrics, including CAC, engagement, and conversion rates.
	Collaborate with the Operations and Product teams to align marketing with trip launches.


What You&rsquo;ll Bring


	2&ndash;5 years of marketing experience (travel, lifestyle, or consumer brand preferred).
	Knows how to build and manage a sales funnel&mdash;from lead generation to booking.
	Strong grasp of digital marketing, content strategy, and performance analytics.
	Strong grasp of SEO and email marketing.
	Hands-on experience with tools like Canva, Meta Ads Manager, Google Analytics, and Mailchimp.
	Creative thinker with a data-driven mindset.
	Passion for travel, culture, and building community.


Benefits
Success Looks Like:


	Salary: N200,000 - N300,000 Monthly.
	Increased trip bookings and customer retention.
	Growth in social media engagement and reach.
	High-performing ad campaigns with measurable ROI.
	Strong brand presence across West Africa and beyond.

Sales and Marketing Lead Job at Creatives Island (TCI)




        
    

        
        The Creatives Island (TCI) is a fast-growing travel and experiences company curating unforgettable group and solo adventures across Africa.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Posititon: Sales and Marketing Lead

Job Location: Lagos 
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	We’re seeking a results-driven Marketing and Sales Manager to lead our brand growth, digital campaigns, and community engagement initiatives.


What You’ll Do
     

            
    




	Develop and execute marketing strategies to drive trip bookings and brand awareness.
	Identify and close business leads.

	Strong grasp of digital marketing, content strategy, and performance analytics.
	Strong grasp of SEO and email marketing.
	Hands-on experience with tools like Canva, Meta Ads Manager, Google Analytics, and Mailchimp.

	Passion for travel, culture, and building community.


Benefits

	Salary: N200,000 - N300,000 Monthly.
	Increased trip bookings and customer retention.
	Growth in social media engagement and reach.
	High-performing ad campaigns with measurable ROI.
	Strong brand presence across West Africa and beyond.
